content.en: Solar cell optimization: Researchers have developed and evaluated various algorithms to accurately extract and estimate parameters of solar cell models in different weather conditions. These algorithms, such as the lightning search algorithm, direct search optimization method, Non-dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm-II, Coyote Optimization Algorithm, and others, are proposed and compared with conventional methods. They have shown promising results in terms of accuracy and speed, outperforming other optimization algorithms.
content.da: Solcelleoptimering: Forskere har udviklet og evalueret forskellige algoritmer til nøjagtigt at udtrække og estimere parametre for solcellemodeller i forskellige vejrforhold. Disse algoritmer, såsom lightning search-algoritmen, direkte søgningsoptimeringsmetoden, Non-dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm-II, Coyote Optimization Algorithm og andre, er foreslået og sammenlignet med konventionelle metoder. De har vist lovende resultater med hensyn til nøjagtighed og hastighed og overgår andre optimeringsalgoritmer.
